reference.title: Getting bucket streaming URI
reference.shortdesc: To retrieve the streaming URI, use GET /pools/default/buckets/default HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p:
The individual bucket request is exactly the same as what would be obtained from the item in the array for the entire buckets list. The streamingUri is exactly the same except it streams HTTP chunks using chunked encoding. A response of "



" delimits chunks which may be converted to a "zero chunk" in a future release. The behavior of the streamingUri should be considered evolving.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets/default Host: localhost:8091 Authorization: Basic xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Accept: application/json X-memcachekv-Store-Client-Specification-Version: 0.1

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets/default Host: 10.5.2.117:8091 Authorization: Basic xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Accept: application/json X-memcachekv-Store-Client-Specification-Version: 0.1
